{{Rot resistance}}, {{Negative energy resistance}}, {{Torment resistance}} |vulnerabilities={{Holy vulnerability}} |max_chunks=0 |meat={{No corpse}} |xp=602 |holiness={{Nonliving}} |magic_resistance=Immune |hp_range=70 |avg_hp=70 |armour_class=12 |evasion=1 |habitat=land |speed=10 |size={{Large}} |item_use={{Uses nothing}} |attack1= |attack2= |attack3= |attack4= |hit_dice=8 |base_hp=0 |extra_hp=0 |fixed_hp=70 |intelligence={{High intelligence}} |genus=clay golem |species=spooky statue }} {{Flavour|You sense a ghostly presence around this statue, and it's not the slightest bit friendly.}} ==Useful Info== '''Spooky statues''' are stationary monsters that attack by occasionally casting [[Haunt]] on you when you are in their [[line of sight]]. Unlike some [[statue]]s, they are not vulnerable to [[wands of disintegration]]. They can be found in certain endings of [[the Crypt]], usually behind a small lake and guarding a small cache of treasure. ==Spells== {{Spellcaster |number= |slot1=[[Haunt]] |slot2=''none'' |slot3=''none'' |slot4=''none'' |slot5=''none'' |slot6=''none'' }} {{clear}} ==Tips & Tricks== *An [[amulet of warding]] can help protect you from the summoned undead while you smash the statue to pieces. *They can't see you (and thus can't haunt you) if you're [[invisible]]. However, stepping into the water near them immediately makes you visible again. Fly over it while invisible to render these guys harmless. ==History== In [[0.13]] they were replaced with patrolling [[curse skull]]s. [[Category:Obsolete monsters]]
